channel.title: Are you going to update?
channel.description:
Hi. I was just wondering if you are still active and if so if you will update the mod to the Satisfactory U4? Alot of people LOVE your mod "FoundationIndustries" and now it's not working with the new update of the game.... :'-(
People asking for you on the Discord Channel "Satisfactory Modding" as well. =O)

item.title: Are you going to update?
item.dc:creator: @Tugge_Thurgren Tugge Thurgren
item.description:

Hi.
